name: shadcnui

description: An extension for quickly navigating the shadcn/ui ecosystem.
author: jacksmethurst

commands.name: set-install
commands.title: Package Manager
commands.description: Set your preferred package manager for Shadcn

commands.name: resources
commands.title: Resources
commands.description: Access external resources related to Shadcn

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
